songs.title: Locomia
songs.lyrics:
[Letra de "Locomia"]

Disco Ibiza, loco mia
Moda Ibiza, loco mia
Loco Ibiza, loco mia
Sexo Ibiza, loco mia
Mar Ibiza, loco mia
Sol Ibiza, loco mia
Marcha Ibiza, loco mia
Crazy Ibiza, loco mia

Loco mia keeps your body movin'
Get up on the groove
Get into the mood ger it
Loco mia keeps your body movin'
Abanicos will be groovin' till they see you
Gettin' it
Loco mia keeps your body movin'
Ain't nothing to it let your body do it
Ahhh
Loco mia keeps your body movin'
Don't you ever let nobody tell ya
You can't get down

Lo-co-mia
Lo-co-mia

Sube el dolar, no cogían
Unimessi, no cogían
Deuda externen, no cogían
Samba olen, no cogían
Inflacionen, no cogían
Maradonen, no cogían
Mortal Kombat ser la posten
Fatality por el orten

Lo-co-mia
Lo-co-mia

Lo-co-mia
Lo-co-mia

Lo-co-mia
Lo-co-mia
